backend/main.mo: Implements a simple cooldown-based rate limiter using device IDs and timestamps to allow or deny actions. Provides functions to check and record actions with a 3‑minute cooldown.
feature_evidence.json: Defines a feature report describing a frontend change to load user-provided image URLs in VisualTrustSection at specified positions.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of various frontend files including pages, layout components, sections, config, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers and extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes, applying base background and border styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting metadata, fonts, and root element, loading the main React script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router with root layout and routes for home, privacy, and terms pages using environment-based base path.
frontend/src/components/common/ImageWith: React image component that shows a gradient placeholder while loading or on error, preserving layout and preventing broken images.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer with company info, links, social icons, and a rate-limited WhatsApp button using backend checks.
frontend/src/components/layout/Navbar.ts: Sticky navbar with brand navigation, smooth scroll behavior, and responsive mobile drawer menu.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Wraps all pages with a common layout containing the navbar, routed content, and footer.
frontend/src/components/sections/AboutSe: About section describing MagadhPrime's production quality, hygiene, and natural processing.
frontend/src/components/sections/Benefit: Displays four benefit cards highlighting organic sourcing, added bran, chemical-free processing, and hygienic quality.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Landing hero with background image and WhatsApp order button including rate‑limit checks and error handling.
frontend/src/components/sections/Support: Support form with validation, rate‑limit checks, and Google Forms submission plus success/error states.
frontend/src/components/sections/VisualT: Displays a grid of production‑process images with captions to build brand trust.
frontend/src/components/sections/WhatsAp: WhatsApp CTA section offering an order button with rate‑limit checking and error display.
frontend/src/config/marketing.ts: Central marketing config defining WhatsApp link, contact info, social URLs, address, and Google Forms settings.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider managing Internet Identity auth client, login flow, stored identity, and related status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/usePageMeta.ts: Hook that updates the document title and meta description when page metadata changes.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive CSS variables for light/dark themes and custom utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/assetUrl.ts: Provides helpers to build correct asset URLs using Vite's BASE_URL, including generated assets.
frontend/src/lib/deviceId.ts: Generates and stores a persistent device UUID in localStorage with fallback for older browsers.
frontend/src/lib/googleFormsSubmit.ts: Submits contact form data to Google Forms using configured field mappings and no‑cors mode.
frontend/src/lib/rateLimit.ts: Checks frontend rate limits by querying the backend using a device‑scoped action identifier.
frontend/src/lib/scrollToSection.ts: Smoothly scrolls to a section by ID with an offset for a sticky header.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider, applying global CSS.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage sections and handles hash‑based smooth scrolling with page metadata setup.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicyPage.tsx: Displays the Privacy Policy content with page metadata configured.
frontend/src/pages/TermsOfUsePage.tsx: Displays the Terms of Use content with page metadata configured.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors mapped to CSS variables, typography, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Defines project configuration and architectural notes for building a mobile‑first marketing site with performance, SEO, image handling, and content rules, plus known issues and existing implemented features. Contains detailed constraints for visuals, navigation, and prohibited terminology.
